roleset.name: cause to meet

example.name: with arg2
example.text: John reintroduced Mary to the pleasures of chocolate ice cream.
example.arg: to the pleasures of chocolate ice cream.

roleset.note: REINTRODUCE-V NOTES: To my mind, "reintroduce" takes two almost-symmetrical arguments; thatis, if arg1 is reintroduced to arg2, logically arg2 is reintroduced toarg1 as well. Further, there are complicated figure-ground andintentionality relations to worry about also. To AVOID all of that,take a purely *syntactic* approach to the arg1/arg2 distinction: arg2is reintroduced by "to". (from reintroduce.01-v)

roleset.name: implement, begin, bring up

role.descr: medium, where arg1 is brought up into

example.name: advertising
example.text: Newsweek will reintroduce a new incentive plan for advertisers.
example.arg: a new incentive plan for advertisers.

example.name: with medium
example.text: The man with the clipboard reintroduced a bit of les sportif into our itinerary.

roleset.note: REINTRODUCE-V NOTES: In WSJ this sense seems to be more common. Especially when the"medium" argument is present, the two senses are very close inmeaning, at least to my mind. (from reintroduce.02-v)
